title: PATT Standard T&S Grant 2010 for Dr D A Green
abstractText: The observations planned are Proposal 17_051, 'Observations of the young SNR G1.9+0.3' and Proposal 17_052, 'Further polarisation observations of nearby galaxies'.
impactText: This &quot;grant&quot; was for an oberving trip to the GMRT. These formed part of a PhD, and have been published. Other
findingsText: Successful polarisation observations made with GMRT. Results published in scientific literature. Other
